properties.name: description
properties.value: Paddlefish is food obtained within The Gauntlet, healing 20 Hitpoints. Paddlefish can be obtained by fishing raw paddlefish with a crystal harpoon and cooking it on the range in the starting room. The paddlefish can burn, producing burnt paddlefish. It will stop burning at Cooking level 48.

Paddlefish is food obtained within The Gauntlet, healing 20 Hitpoints. Paddlefish can be obtained by fishing raw paddlefish with a crystal harpoon and cooking it on the range in the starting room. The paddlefish can burn, producing burnt paddlefish. It will stop burning at Cooking level 48.

They can be upgraded to crystal paddlefish with an additional 10 crystal shards.

[[File:Paddlefish detail.png|left|120px]]
'''Paddlefish''' is food obtained within [[The Gauntlet]], healing 20 [[Hitpoints]]. Paddlefish can be obtained by fishing [[raw paddlefish]] with a [[crystal harpoon (The Gauntlet)|crystal harpoon]] and cooking it on the range in the starting room. The paddlefish can burn, producing [[burnt fish (paddlefish)|burnt paddlefish]]. It will stop burning at [[Cooking]] level 48.

They can be upgraded to [[crystal paddlefish]] with an additional 10 crystal shards.
